timeline.title: Software Development Intern
description: Automated end-to-end deployment pipeline for ArcGIS Enterprise on Jenkins, saving 10 hours
Designed an issue management system to track and optimize workflow, increasing efficiency by 50%

timeline.title: Staff Engineer
description: Implemented IBM's Secret Manager on IaaS with SOC2 encryption, eliminating HSMs and saving $3 Million
Integrated IBM IAM with OpenID Connect for automated user permission management, cutting ticket turnaround by 90%
Integrated change data capture enabling metadata transfer, automating updates to SSOT and ServiceNow

timeline.title: Full-Stack Developer
description: Orchestrated deployment pipelines on Kubernetes, eliminating downtime to 0 seconds
Designed Sports and Game Aggregator Platforms managing ~14M weekly requests, reducing response time by 30%

timeline.title: Software Developer
description: Led Educational Loan project, designing key modules and managing a team of four, improving efficiency by 30%
Implemented LDAP-based authentication and Celery queues for asynchronous processing
Created eMandate module removing manual EMI collection, saving $500K
